feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix tsconfig.json for dev using shared-core by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13315
  • Allow all external table deletion by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13319
  • Add "clicked row" context for live eval to table blocks by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13298
  • Fix requiring double keypress to create new rows by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13311
  • Remove mysql mock by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13316
  • Move viewV2 tests out of row.spec.ts and into viewV2.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13266
  • Remove mssql mock, unify SQL-based query tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13318
  • Fix string-templates bundling issue by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13323

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.7...2.22.8

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • BUDI-8084 - Single attachment binding as subtype by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13317

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.8...2.22.9

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix for boolean values getting stripped when running processObject by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13332

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.9...2.22.10

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update isolated-vm bundler by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13331

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.10...2.22.11

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Table/Tableblock deprecated and replaced with Gridblock by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13239
  • Various fixes and improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13327
  • Remove worker aws-sdk, oauth, node-fetch mocks. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13310
  • Disabling single attachment column by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13342

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.11...2.22.12
